name: An ECMS user creates a CTB component and views it on the General Content page undefined @component @inw

steps.name: Given: I navigate to home page
When: Create a Generic Content page
locator.getByRole('button', { name: 'Open context menu for Home' }).waitFor
locator.getByRole('button', { name: 'Open context menu for Home' }).click
Then: I navigate back to home page
Background: I get the Telephone number from Contact Section page
Given: I select a Generic Content page
And: I search for the CTB component
And: I click the CTB component
And: I fill out CTB Title
And: I fill out the CTB Rich text editor

And: I click 'Create' button for CTB component
                         And: I click 'Save and publish' button

When: I click 'Info' tab
                         And: click the link to the page

And: I redirect the Generic Content page
                         Then: I should see the CTB displayed on the Generic Content Page with details
